item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in the New Haven area.

This week's location is: BENTARA

From Jackie at Bentara's....

Bentara Welcomes the New Haven Collective
February 1st
Happy Hour Treats
Spring Rolls
Mee Goreng Noodles


SPECIALTY DRINKS
Happy Hour Prices
$6.00
Coconut Pineapple Breezer
Coconut Rum ~ Pineapple

Malaysian Rain Forest
Vodka ~ Melon Liquor ~ Orange ~ Pineapple juice

Malaysian Typhoon
Southern Comfort ~ Amaretto ~ Vodka
Orange juice ~ Pineapple juice

Malacca Warrior
Light Rum ~Coconut Rum ~ Melon Liquor ~ Pineapple Juice

SPECIAL BENTARA MARTINIS - $7.00

Bentara’s Martini
Gin ~ Banana Liquor ~ Coconut Rum Sweet and Dry Vermouth ~ Orange & Cherry

Purple Buddha
Vodka ~ Pineapple juice ~ Sour Mix ~ Soda
Raspberry Liquor


Back Bar Draft Beers /Bottled Beer/Wine by the glass
½ Price


Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

Contact: Robyn-Allise - 203-823-5302

***Bring a friend***

Post-party location TBD.
item.name: Happy Hour at Bentara's
